name: Outlands (Merix)
description:
Welcome to the Outlands, Commander! 

Hand-pick and take charge of your Gallant fleet as you protect your star systems and push back the Alseer tide!

Game Modes (Playable)
  • Tutorial - introducing the mechanics and narrative of Outlands.
  • Hold Fast - A wave based survival mode. Select your fleet, and survive against waves of enemy AI.
Game Modes (In Development)
  • Campaign - Sandbox based with narrative elements to guide the player. Unite the Gallant clans to push back and defeat the Alseer.
  • Skirmish - Select and customise a fleet to challenge an enemy AI fleet.
  • Multiplayer Versus - Select and customise a fleet to challenge an enemy player fleet.
Features (Playable)
  • Battle Damage - Starship appearances change to show damage; no health bars! (Currently with placeholder material changes. Mesh changes coming soon!)
  • Starship Abilites - Rush to combat with a speed boost, or turn the tide with a perfect broadside!
  • Starship Subsystem Interaction - Each starships features it's own subsystems (engines, hull, shields, weapons, etc) to be individually targeted and destroyed.
Features (In Development)
  • Customisation - Configure each starship to your liking with functional and aesthetic upgrades.
  • 45 planets!
  • 14 starships!
  • Sandbox campaign supplemented with narrative elements!
  • 2 factions!
Note

A GTX 1060 (6GB)/RX 480(8GB) is recommended to play at a stable framerate. There's much optimisation to happen in the coming months, but let me know of any particular pain points you might find.
